description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Cranford ... With a preface by A. Thackeray Ritchie. With ... illustrations ... by Hugh Thomson", "Single Works" Author: Gaskell, Elizabeth Cleghorn Contributor: Ritchie, Anne Thackeray Contributor: THOMSON, Hugh. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 012621.h.52." Page: 257 Place of Publishing: Macmillan & Co.; New York Date of Publishing: 1898 Publisher: London Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001372687 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
